com.mumfrey.liteloader

Interface ServerPlayerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Exposable, Listener, LiteMod

    public interface ServerPlayerListener
extends LiteMod
    Interface for mods which want to handle players joining and leaving a LAN game (or single player game)
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPlayerConnect(EntityPlayerMP player, GameProfile profile)
      Called when a player connects to the server and the EntityPlayerMP instance is created, the player has not logged in at this point and may be disconnected if login fails.
      void onPlayerLoggedIn(EntityPlayerMP player)
      Called once the player has successfully logged in and all player variables are initialised and replicated.
      void onPlayerLogout(EntityPlayerMP player)
      Called when a player disconnects from the game
      void onPlayerRespawn(EntityPlayerMP player, EntityPlayerMP oldPlayer, int newDimension, boolean playerWonTheGame)
      Called when a player respawns.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.mumfrey.liteloader.LiteMod

        getVersion, init, upgradeSettings

      • Methods inherited from interface com.mumfrey.liteloader.api.Listener

        getName

    • Method Detail

      • onPlayerConnect

        void onPlayerConnect(EntityPlayerMP player,
                     GameProfile profile)
        Called when a player connects to the server and the EntityPlayerMP instance is created, the player has not logged in at this point and may be disconnected if login fails.
        Parameters:
        player - Player attempting to connect
        profile - Player's GameProfile from the authentication service

      • onPlayerLoggedIn

        void onPlayerLoggedIn(EntityPlayerMP player)
        Called once the player has successfully logged in and all player variables are initialised and replicated.
        Parameters:
        player - Player connected

      • onPlayerRespawn

        void onPlayerRespawn(EntityPlayerMP player,
                     EntityPlayerMP oldPlayer,
                     int newDimension,
                     boolean playerWonTheGame)
        Called when a player respawns. This event is raised when a player respawns after dying or conquers the end.
        Parameters:
        player - New player instance
        oldPlayer - Old player instance being discarded
        newDimension - Dimension the player is respawning in
        playerWonTheGame - True if the player conquered the end (this respawn is NOT as the result of a death)

      • onPlayerLogout

        void onPlayerLogout(EntityPlayerMP player)
        Called when a player disconnects from the game
        Parameters:
        player - Player disconnecting
